questions.question: Promotion of a product can include all of the following except:

choices.answer: advertising a new product
offering money-off vouchers to encourage increased sales
personal selling by using sales representatives
redesigning a product to make it look more modern

questions.question: One of the aims of promotion is to:

choices.answer: lower the price of the product
update the product
inform consumers about the product
to lower the costs of producing the product

questions.question: Before deciding on the most appropriate advertising media, it is important to:

choices.answer: change the price of the product
redesign the product
establish the target audience for the product
introduce an extension strategy for the product

questions.question: Which of the following is an advantage of television advertising?

choices.answer: It is cheaper than most other forms of advertising.
It can be used to give the consumer product information.
It can be aimed at audiences at different times of the day.
All members of the target audience will see the adverts

questions.question: If a firm wanted to advertise the technical details of its products, it would use:

choices.answer: a business newspaper
billboards and posters
radio
cinema adverts

questions.question: If a toy retailer wants to inform potential consumers of its large product range. It would use:

choices.answer: billboards and posters
children’s television
evening radio programmes
national newspapers

questions.question: A firm is set to launch a new high energy sports drink. Which method of promotion would it use?

choices.answer: national television advertising during the Olympic Games
sports magazines with a national coverage
national newspapers
a local radio station

questions.question: Which of the following is an example of sales promotion?

choices.answer: advertising a new product on television
using specialist magazines to advertise the product
billboards and posters
special offers and free gifts

questions.question: All of the following are important when considering which method ofpromotion to use except:

choices.answer: the stage of the product life cycle the product is in
the total promotional budget
the target audience (or market) being aimed at
the packaging of the product

questions.question: One of the advantages of sales promotion is that it:

choices.answer: encourages consumers to buy the product more often
informs the public of a new product
allows the firm to lower the price
does not cost the firm anything, unlike advertising.

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT an example of public relations?

choices.answer: promotion of a football team
donations by the firm to charity
advertising on national radio
letting a newspaper journalist try a product out

questions.question: One argument against all forms of promotion is that:

choices.answer: they are always very expensive
they raise firms’ costs and this could raise prices
they are unfair as children will nag parents to buy products
some people might not see the promotions

questions.question: Personal selling is most likely to be used forwhich of the following products?

choices.answer: daily newspaper
bars of chocolate
food products from a supermarket
business computers
